subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Tyler, a 6-foot-11 prospect from San Diego, is on the cusp of signing with Maccabi Haifa, which finished in second place in Israel’s top division last season.
snippet: Jeremy Tyler, a 6-foot-11 prospect from San Diego, is on the cusp of signing with Maccabi Haifa, which finished in second place in Israel’s top division last season.
